nodes.text: Keep the Core Secure was an organization of which Moff Tiaan Jerjerrod of the Galactic Empire was a member of. During a Bothan intelligence operation, the Alliance to Restore the Republic was able to obtain a type of data card of Moff Jerjerrod, which demonstrated his rank, homeworld, height, weight, age, and memberships. Along with Keep the Core Secure, listed memberships included COMPNOR, Emperor's Boosters, and the Taung & Zhell Society from the University of Coruscant.
The data card would eventually be incorporated into The Rebel Files, a central data repository that contained physical documents and intelligence of the Alliance.
